segments.text: It's such a shame to see this happy home turning messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just drying dishes, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink's overflowing, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water, she doesn't even feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are playing around, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, but it feels risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting cookies, that's all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is beautiful, full of life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, it's like a quiet tragedy unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and keep them safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
